Description_lang: Expend your Cunning to reduce the cooldown of $?a137008[Icebound Fortitude]?a212613[Metamorphosis]?a137010[Survival Instincts]?a137023[Fortifying Brew]?a137028[Guardian of Ancient Kings]?a137048[Shield Wall][a strong defensive ability] by $<cooldown> sec per stack.
